column1: The Pit Room////It's dangerous living across the street from this!!! Their BBQ is amazing
column2: but their Mac and cheese is TO DIE FOR! So simple and creamy... perfection! Everything on their menu is pretty killer. I usually split a 3 meat dinner plate with my boyfriend because it comes with 2 sides as well and we ask for an extra slice of bread- It's pretty filling for the both of us. It also doesn't hurt that you can grab the tray of food to-go to sit at The Patio bar next door to enjoy a good drink with it!
